title: Paris/La Défense
name: Hotel Novotel Paris La Défense
directions: Right next to the Seine, at the intersection of ''D7'' and ''A14'', where ''N13'' enter La Defense over the bridge. On foot, exit from ''Esplanade de La Defense'' and head northeast over the walkways - you will need to take the stairs to street level, as the entrance to the Novotel is below the Esplanade.

reviews.content: It's a very good experience in Ritz Carlton. The scene of the hotel is very beautiful. The service people are very kindness and sincere The setting was very scenic. I would definitely come back again.
reviews.author: Mrs. Torey Hills

reviews.content: I have stayed here before and is has always been great. This time I was part of a large group. The 2012 Hyundai Pro Am golf tournament. From the minute I arrived at the airport to the minuteI left the service was 100 plus procent. The food and service was great,looking forward to my next stay here
reviews.author: Janessa Kilback

description: A rather generic, modern Novotel, with "executive rooms" providing global standards, and the regular rooms the standard French Novotel fare with toothpaste-inspired bathroom fit-outs. Some rooms (available at a small extra) provide views over the river Seine.
